A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Unbelievably bad!! WTH can Disney do any worse! Strip everything out of lore to make this unbelievable movie a canon movie! Slap in the face to everyone who loves Star Wars. Why would this crap be any better than any other story? Why not let Qui Gon Jinn kill off the Count Dooko\, the emperor or Vader in attack of the clones!? The Yoda scene is unbelievable and shouldn’t be lore! Your also telling me they can fire blasters until well they are dead but can’t find a way to power a ship the same way? Just a couple of complaints the only reason I’m giving it two stars is because they did do a good job on special effects!
